SEARCH
Package com.raylib.jextract

Class AudioStream

java.lang.Object
com.raylib.jextract.AudioStream
public class AudioStream extends Object
struct AudioStream {
    rAudioBuffer *buffer;
    rAudioProcessor *processor;
    unsigned int sampleRate;
    unsigned int sampleSize;
    unsigned int channels;
}
